General.Name: Globe Exploration (Y.C.D.) Limited Partnership
General.Description: Globe Exploration (Y.C.D.) Limited Partnership engages in the oil and gas exploration, development, and production activities in Israel and the United States. The company holds a participation interest in the New Ofek and New Yahel licenses in Israel; and a 90% working interest in an oil lease in Santa Barbara, California. Globe Oil Exploration Ltd. serves as a general partner of the company. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Rishon LeZion, Israel.

0.Name: Mr. Zvi  Derin
0.Title: Vice Chairman & CEO of Globe Oil Exploration Limited
